website_summaries.verdict: The G-Technology G-Connect is a try-hard portable/wireless storage device that doesn't achieve much in the end.
pros: The G-Technology G-Connect works as a portable drive or a NAS server with a built-in wireless router that supports five iOS devices for media streaming via a mobile app
cons: The G-Connect is confusing to use and is so far behind its competition in terms of features

customer_reviews.title: device didn't set up properly
customer_reviews.text: I was very very disappointed in this device. It was slow to send signal to computer. It didn't set up properly. Never accepted new name. I was NOT able to get the device to even work once. I returned the device. Even my husband who is an engineer couldn't get the device to work. We felt this was defective. Save your money....don't purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hook

customer_reviews.title: Never got it to work with my home network. ...
customer_reviews.text: Never got it to work with my home network. Had to send it back to the company 3 times, with the 4th one I decided to call it quits and just gave up!
customer_reviews.author: Semaj

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been able to connect it. Too confusing to install.
customer_reviews.author: Fanny Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good WiFi hub but not quite as good as an old Apple Airport Express.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L. Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Probably a great product... lacks any real instructions that make it work. I call my an expensive paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Todd McNutt

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product but it should also use battery so it would be protable
customer_reviews.author: courtney c.

customer_reviews.title: Just Crap
customer_reviews.text: This thing is crap! G-Technology usually makes a very good product, but in this case the blow it!
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Boo!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work. But after about 8 hours of trying to update the firmware and messing with the app and web interface to get files uploaded, I decided to return the item. I was never able to transfer files from my computer, iphone, or ipad to the harddrive. I am now on the search for something that will work the way it advertises.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working a couple of weeks after I got it while using it during a vacation. And does not hold files larger than 3 gigs.
customer_reviews.author: JON A HALL

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: don't bother -- you will wish you hadnt if you do buy this
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: thanks
customer_reviews.text: its good staff . and new things and good quailty thanks for buyer and hi is good buyer my wish
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with the iPad there is no plug device for the iPad
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with the iPad there is no plug device for the iPad very disappointed I will not recommend it to any of my friends
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trouble
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't do what it claims. A waste of money.tyt ffhhgg fhgf fight ggjhfdf doggy afghan gggf dgjj polio fight
customer_reviews.author: Robert Conry

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for long
customer_reviews.text: The Good Fairly easy to install and set up. Like the fact that when plugged into my cat5 outlet it acted as a hot spot and got a good signal. The Bad It only worked for 4 months before it quit. You can not send files two and from your computer and drive vea wi-fi you have to plug the unit into the computer to transfer files.... dumb. Returned the unit for a refund after it stopped working as a hot spot. It would show as giving out a signal but when you linked up you could not get online. I tried rebooting & re-setting with three different computers... no go so it went.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.M in TN

customer_reviews.title: Does not remember passwords.
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a very device to access picture files to display on my ipad. But every time you turn the device off next time you use it you have to go through the password setting procedure all over again. It just does not remember the passwords. When I try to connect with the ipad I get the message: Incorrect password. I do not even need a password as I would only use the device at home.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel W. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great storage Poor Security
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for my husband's Ipad Air. He love the amount of storage....but discover there was no password protection. He pluged into his laptop and did not need to use the password. He was very disappointed because he needs that security for work files. He just uses it for photos storage at home.
customer_reviews.author: J. I. COMSTOCK

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money and time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a while back. Did not work properly and lasted only about a 2 months. PWR/HDD light on, WIFI ON and the Status is RED. Piece of Cr@p. Don't buy. Waste of Money and time.
customer_reviews.author: pinaybryd

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but a little bit pricy
customer_reviews.text: One of the best thing of G-Connect is that I can share the file to my colleague, even my company blocks the USB port of the laptop. Also, it's great that I can use my iPad watching the movie on my bed via WiFi. However, the price is high, I remember it was $199 last year.
customer_reviews.author: yoyo

customer_reviews.title: Seems great...
customer_reviews.text: ...Now when the hell will it be available??? We keep hearing about it. Ad Nauseum. What's the story with the drive Hitachi??
customer_reviews.author: Joseph  Corrado

product_meta.title: G-Technology G-CONNECT 500 GB GigE USB 2.0 Wireless Storage for iPad (0G02148)
product_meta.description:
G-CONNECT wireless storage for your iPad and iPhone. Stream content to 4 devices at once, or even access the Internet. Use it for on-the-go access to content that’s not loaded on your iPad or iPhone, including your favorite movies, music, books, photos, and documents. Loading content from a computer or laptop to the G-CONNECT is fast and easy. Supporting more than 5 users, G-CONNECT is ideal for home, dorm room, office, or hotel. iPad and iPhone apps are available for quick and easy access. And password protection means you always have control of your content.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Providing easy access, wireless storage for your iPad and iPhone. View larger
All content is organized for quick and convenient access. View larger The G-Technology G-CONNECT provides wireless storage for your iPad and iPhone. Stream content to 5 devices at once, or even access the Internet. Use it for on-the-go access to content that's not loaded on your iPad or iPhone, including your favorite movies, music, books, photos and documents. Loading content from a computer or laptop to the G-Technology G-CONNECT is fast and easy. Supporting 5+ users, the G-Technology G-CONNECT is ideal for home, dorm room, office, or hotel use. iPad and iPhone apps are available for quick and easy access to your content. And password protection means you always have control of your content.

Connect via Ethernet or network for your own personal cloud. View larger SIMULTANEOUS CONTENT STREAMING & INTERNET ACCESS
The G-Technology G-CONNECT can wirelessly stream high definition content to up to three devices or standard definition content to up to five devices simultaneously. It even acts as a Wi-Fi Internet access point for 5+ users.

When connected via Ethernet to a network, the G-Technology G-CONNECT storage device becomes your own personal cloud or Wi-Fi Internet access point, allowing you to surf and stream content, wirelessly, at the same time. Access and view content on the G-Technology G-CONNECT solution with the mobile iOS app, available in the App Store, or through your browser. Android devices are also supported with access through a web browser.

Flexible access means you can stream content not just to your iPhone or iPad, but to multiple web browsers on PC and Mac computers, DLNA-compatible devices, and AppleTVs with AirPlay.

SIMPLE AND EASY TO USE
Load content either wirelessly or through a fast USB 2.0 port from a computer to the G-Technology G-CONNECT storage device. When connected, all content is automatically discovered and organized into Music, Movies, Photos, and Documents. iPad and iPhone apps are available for quick and convenient access, and password protection means secure control over your valuable content. The G-Technology G-CONNECT is the ideal wireless storage device for home, dorm room, office, or hotel use.

Fitting easily in your laptop bag, backpack or purse, the G-Technology G-CONNECT is the must have iPad and iPhone storage companion. Power it up in a dorm room, conference room, or hotel room via its AC adapter or take it on the road using Apple iPad-compatible USB power cables, car power adapters, or external batteries for hours of entertainment wherever you go.

Supporting 5+ users, the G-CONNECT is ideal for home, dorm room, office, or hotel use as well as production projects. Plus, iPad and iPhone apps are available for quick and easy access to your content WHAT'S IN THE BOX
G-Technology G-CONNECT Wireless Storage for iPad, USB 2.0 cable, AC power adapter, Quick Start Guide, 3-year limited warranty.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
 * Wi-Fi: 802.11 b/g/n, WPA-2 security
 * Network Port: Gigabit Ethernet
 * Interface: USB 2.0 compliant
 * Connector: USB 2.0, 5-pin Mini-B socket
 * Capacity: 500GB
 * Web Browsers: Internet Explorer 7+, Mac Safari 4+
 * Dimensions: 135.3mm x 24.4.mm x 87mm
 * Weight: 275 grams/9.7oz

iPad and iPhone are registered trademarks of Apple, Inc.
